name: Double Kilt
description:
Defeat your opponent and please the king by spilling blood, but ultimately the king decides, because more blood is more money....

The game can be played with 2 Xbox controllers and a mouse.

The game was made for the Global Game Jam 2014

You need to run this game two times: One for the duel, one for the King.

This can be done via networking, or on the same PC (localhost)

Credits:

Bob Jacobs - Art

Valentijn Muijrers - Code

Jelle van Aanholt - Sound

Peter Klijn - Art

Manuel Kerssemakers - Code
